full_text:
It was a pleasure to talk politics with @Varneyco on @FoxBusiness last week.
https://t.co/HCpNk66IEP

I was glad to stop by @koconews last week to discuss North Korea and other topics.
https://t.co/HBgqODBKIU

#OKCCincoDeMayo2018 https://t.co/1l2ctMqAM2

I stopped by @OKCFOX last week to discuss the forthcoming report on the ambush on our troops in Niger last fall.
https://t.co/ZsFyYVOBaQ

I stopped by @NewsOK yesterday to catch up with @_davemorris. I discussed the upcoming meeting between President Trump and Kim Jong Un and the forthcoming Niger report among other topics.
https://t.co/Xq0fu5T0SE

I was honored to receive a letter from the Ethiopian Human Rights Task Force regarding my support for the House passage of H.R. 128, which expressed the House's solidarity with the Ethiopian people in the face of their oppressive government. https://t.co/iaAlslM2dD

Yesterday I spoke with Lee Matthews on @NEWSRADIOKTOK. We talked about Macron's address, North Korea, and the forthcoming report on the ambush on our troops in Niger last fall.
https://t.co/PTlk8TQLgd

I spoke with Lee Matthews on @NEWSRADIOKTOK yesterday. We talked about Syria and U.S. foreign policy.
https://t.co/PyA0g30OVL

I was glad to join @cspan for its @cspanwj program this morning. I talked about the need for a congressional vote on a new Authorization for Use of Military Force (AUMF) in the Syria conflict.
https://t.co/EcpyY3gLp0

The night of the U.S. strike in Syria, I spoke with @ShannonBream on @FoxNews' @foxnewsnight. Watch here:
https://t.co/pVSRX9KNug
I was on @FoxNews' @foxandfriends over the weekend to discuss the U.S. strike on Syria. Listen here: https://t.co/RNnFjtHxsS

I was glad to speak with Lee Matthews on @NEWSRADIOKTOK yesterday. We talked about Speaker Ryan and other topics. Listen here:
https://t.co/1LypyXJmM9
Last week I spoke with Larry King about the prospect of withdrawing our troops from Syria. Listen here: https://t.co/ZVoRuhHOA9

Yesterday I discussed how tax reform is helping Oklahoma with @OklahomaAFP's John Tidwell.
https://t.co/6ljIymoopL https://t.co/g5Km6YfHqR

50 years ago today, America lost a visionary civil rights leader in Martin Luther King Jr. While his life was senselessly cut short, his message and dream lives on in all of us. #MLK50 https://t.co/MxZcrrH3G9

I was glad to stop by @NEWSRADIOKTOK last Friday to sit down with Lee Matthews. We talked about the 2nd Amendment, North Korea, and my recent one on one meeting with Mike Pompeo.
https://t.co/5oxsGlkcRn
Last week, I discussed my strong opinions on how broken the VA is with @thehill. https://t.co/UJTu3U3J6L

This morning I spoke with @Varneyco on @FoxBusiness about reports that President Trump proposed the military pay for the border wall. We also discussed North Korean leader Kim Jong Un's meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping.
https://t.co/775dJYVft1

I recently spoke with @thehill about John Bolton, the President's incoming national security advisor. Listen here:
https://t.co/Sw632tWaYW

I stopped by @OKCFOX last week to discuss the recent spending bill signed by President Trump, gun violence, and teacher walkouts.
https://t.co/qmuFYX8MNt

I was on Flash Point on @kfor over the weekend discussing recent news including why I voted against the $1.3 trillion spending bill last week. Watch here:
https://t.co/T5vBmN1XId

I was on @AFRnet's Washington Watch program earlier this week speaking with @tperkins, President of the @FRCdc. We discussed the recent Russian hacking of our aviation industry. Listen here: https://t.co/l9dXT0L7oT
I recently spoke with @thehill about government funding and DACA. Listen here: https://t.co/YbdvepWNQ3

I spoke with @KOCOmarkie at @koconews earlier this week. We discussed state and federal issues in the first segment, and in the second segment I answered questions from viewers. https://t.co/wBvPlvpxyi https://t.co/ILON5sS3b2

I stopped by @NewsOK earlier this week to catch up with @_davemorris. I discussed my recent fact finding mission to Niger, the pending talks with North Korea, and the impact of tax reform for Oklahomans.
https://t.co/7hwaztE5ST
Last week I discussed my recent fact finding mission to Niger with @Liz_Wheeler on @OANN. Watch here: https://t.co/k99DStryM1

I was glad to speak with Lee Matthews on @NEWSRADIOKTOK yesterday. We talked about my recent fact finding mission in Niger as well as the trade tariffs.
https://t.co/kdTDhHvbcE

At a House Armed Services Committee hearing this morning, I questioned General Thomas Waldhauser, Commander of the @USAfricaCommand. He spoke about the importance of U.S. presence in the region. Watch here: https://t.co/TrQv9fccXq

Earlier this week I discussed my recent investigative trip to Niger with @NEWS9's @GrantHermesKWTV.
https://t.co/HuveZPx6uh

I was on @AFRnet's Washington Watch program yesterday speaking with @tperkins, President of the @FRCdc. I gave Tony a report on what I learned during my recent investigative trip to Niger. Listen here:
https://t.co/3qBeZ20TK9

Cindy and I join millions of people around the world in mourning the passing of Billy Graham. You can watch today's Capitol service for Reverend Billy Graham here: https://t.co/gfhJoj9od2
https://t.co/PERR00n4Iv https://t.co/NVjjFptYFb

I spoke with @kilmeade on @foxnewsradio this morning about my recent investigative trip to Niger as well as the fight against gun violence. Listen here:
https://t.co/AlIAjy8D8S

I'm accepting nominations for the annual Teacher Recognition Award for teachers in Oklahoma’s 5th District. Nominations will be accepted through April 1. For questions about the nomination process please contact Cecilia Perez at the Del City office. https://t.co/YP7kMSjZvb https://t.co/k7PifcQNRK
I was honored to receive @FRCAction's "True Blue" award last week. https://t.co/hbGEgYVtbe @FRCAction
Congratulations to @davidfholt on his election as mayor of Oklahoma City!
Today, I voted to end years of devastation to our military. Read more here: https://t.co/PHMmkk5lQh

I was glad to join @cspan for their @cspanwj program this morning. I talked about the ongoing discussions between the House and Senate on a deal to avoid a government shutdown as well as my recently released Waste Watch report.
https://t.co/vkMTEbeoQg

I spoke with @BBCNews last night following President Trump's State of the Union address. Listen here: https://t.co/v0wy6wogCc
I spoke with Lee Matthews on @NEWSRADIOKTOK last week about the 350 jobs that Kratos Defense & Security Solutions will be bringing to Oklahoma City. Listen here: https://t.co/is49AwYemZ

Today I announced that Kratos Defense & Security Solutions, Inc., a leading national security solutions provider, is opening a major manufacturing and production facility in Oklahoma City which will bring 350 new jobs to Oklahoma.
https://t.co/3J9G3v8Eic https://t.co/J7Tm44PWHp

https://t.co/M7wKzIerIF

https://t.co/P15k6HoADI

https://t.co/eKdPULFnwH

https://t.co/KiQe2ybfPC

Last week, I stopped by @NewsOK to catch up with @_davemorris. We talked about the latest edition of my Waste Watch report, which highlights wasteful government spending. We also discussed President Trump's first year in office.
https://t.co/7qLLWYXL67
Wonderful fellowship this morning at the 21st Annual MLK Prayer Breakfast. @okcmlk https://t.co/012cCkApnC https://t.co/XmN0Q6Za6n
I visited the @HighNoonClub in Oklahoma City today to discuss the benefits we are seeing from the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, foreign affairs, immigration, and other topics. https://t.co/JJNOHamnrW

Today I released the latest edition of my Waste Watch report, the Farm Bill Edition, which identifies 10 examples of wasteful government spending and programs in agriculture that wasted $16.5 billion in taxpayer dollars.
https://t.co/apDBuSb4Z8 https://t.co/PRD1iWMzgn

A new year brings a fresh start for people all over the country. This year, the same is true for the American economy thanks to the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. The new tax law is good news for the U.S. economy- and good news for the American people.
https://t.co/Eg1A9jYnUk https://t.co/gIPaMbOAVN

Today I voted for the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. Americans can look forward to a new year that will bring more jobs, fairer taxes, and bigger paychecks.
https://t.co/50Y7woamnN https://t.co/8l4kUJSODN

The Trump administration’s action to roll back the government overreach of net neutrality will benefit all users of the internet.
https://t.co/sFdFrEwmjL

In 1986, as Congress was finishing up its tax reform bill, just 18% of Americans told Gallup they thought their taxes would decrease under the bill, while 41% expected them to increase.
See how the Tax Cuts & Jobs Act will benefit you and your family here: https://t.co/Tv2ZBGsFCW https://t.co/qaAVvaALuf

I recently spoke with @PoppyHarlowCNN on @CNN about the Russia investigation and other topics.
https://t.co/tmwGsUNPyY
A very happy #Hanukkah to all those celebrating. https://t.co/BVafdPLx3d

The USS Oklahoma was one of the ships sunk during the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor in 1941. Today, on the 76th anniversary of Pearl Harbor, we honor the memory of the 429 American lives that were lost with the USS Oklahoma.
https://t.co/kDW2I2hX4o https://t.co/rrHecO8Mua

On December 7, we commemorate the 76th anniversary of the morning in 1941 when our nation sustained a surprise attack by the Japanese Navy at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii. That attack killed 2,403 Americans and wounded 1,178 others- causing our nation to enter World War II. #PearlHarbor. https://t.co/ak8OnKSMDV

Yesterday, I spoke at the Supreme Court in defense of religious liberty. Listen here: #JusticeforJack
https://t.co/nMm7inh6Ed https://t.co/YmFr2bvpDY

Happy birthday, Oklahoma! On November 16, 1907, Oklahoma became the 46th state. https://t.co/3wUB25uKe5

Today, I was glad to vote for the Fiscal Year 2018 National Defense Authorization Act (H.R. 2810) as it passed the House by a margin of 356 to 70. I proposed 11 amendments to the FY18 NDAA earlier this year, all of which were adopted.
https://t.co/FZE9NhjAzo https://t.co/C4Wgs6MTw6
It was great to be with members of the Oklahoma Army National Guard's 45th Infantry Brigade on Veterans Day. https://t.co/6zcAKGFY59

This is what Cindy & I looked like the last time America had tax reform- in 1986. With the FY18 budget resolution passed on October 26, and the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act introduced on November 2, we're now on our way toward historic tax reform.
